The price is for 1 person. Address: K. Goris Artsakhyan str. P. T. 10:00The guest house is completely renovated, has 3 bedrooms, 1 spacious living room, kitchen, bathroom, toilet, maximum 10 people can be accommodated in the guest house at the same time. It is equipped with all utilities (constant hot and cold water, gas, electricity,Wi-Fi) There is an inflatable pool in the area.The house is located in the upper part of the city of Goris, from where the whole city opens. There are stalls (bisetka), there is also a barbecue.The mansion is suitable for family, friendly vacations, as well as for hosting tourists. The house has a parking space.It is convenient to organize excursions to the attractions of the region: Khndzoresk swinging bridge, Tatever ropeway, Satan's bridge, Tatev monastery, etc. You can also organize trips to Old Goris, visit museums and get acquainted with the historical and cultural structures of Goris.It is convenient for parents visiting Goris to spend the day with their soldier sons.We also work with transfers.You can also find us on bookingum.Translated from Armenian
